      • getRecord

        public Response getRecord(Data.Database database,
                          java.lang.String table,
                          java.lang.String keyValue,
                          boolean formatValues)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Select * from table where keyColumn = keyValue
        Parameters:
        database - database to query
        table - table name to query
        keyValue - key value to filter on
        formatValues - whether or not to format values, IE callref becomes F0001234
        Returns:
        Response
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sqlQuery

        public Response sqlQuery(Data.Database database,
                         java.lang.String query,
                         boolean formatValues)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Run an arbitrary sql query against either of the two Supportworks databases
        Parameters:
        database - which database to run the query against
        query - the query to run
        formatValues - whether to format values. IE callref becomes F001234
        Returns:
        Response
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
